alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND NORTHERN DANE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cross Plains, or near Middleton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Middleton, Waunakee, Verona, McFarland, Monona, Windsor, Marshall, Deforest, Cottage Grove, Cross Plains, Lodi, Poynette, Mazomanie, Shorewood Hills, Black Earth, Maple Bluff, and Rio. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 117 and 137. U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 74 and 84. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 249 and 269. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 98 and 113. Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 138 and 142. Interstate 94 between mile markers 241 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
